def main():
    n, x, y = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    digits = [int(x) for x in input()]
    remainder = int(''.join(map(str, digits[-y:])))
    if remainder == 0:
        print(0)
        return
    digits_to_change = x - y
    current_remainder = 0
    for i in range(digits_to_change):
        current_remainder *= 2
        current_remainder += digits[n - y - i - 1]
        current_remainder %= remainder
    if current_remainder == 0:
        print(digits_to_change)
        return
    for i in range(digits_to_change):
        if current_remainder + remainder >= 2**(digits_to_change - i):
            print(i + 1)
            return
        current_remainder *= 2
        current_remainder += digits[n - y - i - 1]
        current_remainder %= remainder
    print(-1)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main():
    n,x,y = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    num = input()
    num = num[::-1]
    num = num[y:x]
    num = num[::-1]
    num = int(num)
    ans = 0
    while num > 0:
        if num & 1:
            num -= 1
        else:
            num //= 2
        ans += 1
    print(ans)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
